context.title: About Java Web Tomcat 8
context.description:
Java Web Tomcat 8 requires JVM 7 or higher.
1. In the Name field, enter a name for your runtime environment. The default is Java Web Tomcat 8.
2. In the Use Java Web Tomcat 8 SDK from the following location field you can manually type the full path to the directory where you have downloaded the Java Web Tomcat 8 SDK. If you do not have this SDK locally, choose Download and Install.
3. From the JRE dropdown list, select an environment variable that specifies where your JDK is installed. You can either select the relevant value from the JRE list, or choose Installed JREs to define a new JRE environment variable.
4. Choose Finish.
